website_summaries.verdict: Offers a spacious, expertly constructed bag that fits most standard acoustic guitars.
pros: Non-abrasive soft lining offers extra protection
Zippered exterior sheet music pocket provides added storage
Backpack straps are soft, durable and stylish
cons: Low-quality zippers may break after extended use
A full acoustic guitar won't fit inside the bag

website_summaries.verdict: An incredibly affordable soft case that still offers good protection for acoustic guitars.
pros: Includes a large pocket for sheet music and tuner, and a smaller pocket that is ideal for picks
Rubber on the bottom of the case protects it when setting it down
Includes a carrying handle and backpack straps
cons: Zippers are not super high quality, so take care when closing the case

customer_reviews.title: This is for acoustics, don't believe bad reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I was almost successfully discouraged from purchasing this bag because of some reviews I read that claimed that this was actually for electric guitars and did not fit acoustics. Luckily I didn't listen; I took the chance and purchased it. It fits my acoustic perfectly! Its exactly what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Good, but measure your guitar !
customer_reviews.text: Good, but measure your guitar ! when it sais 41 inch, it means that the length of the case itself is 41 inch, my 41 inch guitar has to stretch it, Yes! we are talking about just an extra half or one inch, but it makes a lot of difference! otherwise quality is exactly as described. so good marks for the value !
customer_reviews.author: vitya

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, if your guitar is worth anything..
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, if your guitar is worth anything.. It's what you pay for. In all Truth. I requested the return receipt the day i received it, due to the paper-thin material. However, i was out of town and the return process time had expired when I got back in town. It's my fault. Sent an email requesting making any exception for return/credit if possible. But haven't heard back. Quality, it's very cheap and thin. The metal hooks holing the straps has come off after the first time carry, since i thought about giving it a try to see it's light accoustic guitar carrying ability. Zippers are pretty bad too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Holder

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's about what you'd expect. Not much padding but it did fit my Yamaha acoustic well. The pockets are small and flat. The top pocket, near the head, had one of the decorative "buttons" missing...leaving an ugly hole that looked like the button was ripped out of it. I returned the case because of the defect but I ordered something different because the overall quality was unsatisfactory. Update: I bought the Amazon Basics bag and am very happy with it. It was like a dollar more...get that one.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: A useful amount of protection in a serviceable form factor for a modest amount
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, inexpensive gig bag. It has adequate padding for minor bumps and scrapes, and a functional pocket that will hold (by estimate) 30 to 40 pages of 8.5 x 11 music, as well as a small pocket for a tuner or strings. I purchased it for an inexpensive guitar that I purchased for travel (Yamaha CGS104A Full-Size Classical Guitar) and it was perfect to keep it from being beat up by just being packed in the car. I wouldn't use it for an expensive guitars.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m well pleased with this gutair case!! It’s great quality. It’s sturdy and it’s not cheap material whatsoever. I was nervous that my guitar wouldn’t fit, but it fits perfectly. Plus I thought there would be only one strap, but there are two and I’m super excited!! There is enough room in the pocket for a note book and music sheets. Plus the little pocket on top is roomie for many picks to put inside. The only thing is that the zipper for the guitar doesn’t go all the way around, it only goes around in the front as shown in the picture. Which isn’t a big deal. I’m in love with this guitar case. I’m super excited!!
customer_reviews.author: Ester

customer_reviews.title: Naahhh, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case almost a year ago and just realized how LITTLE I've used it... thought I'd upload a review about why. I read all of the 5 star reviews about how this is a good value case, but honestly the only things it will protect against are wind and dust. It's very thin; using this would be comparable to just covering your guitar in sheets of printer paper, and it will not prevent dents and scratches... This would be a cheap option for if you wanted a way to carry your guitar on your back. Otherwise, stay away from this and just invest in a better case with actual padding...
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Too short for the average guitar
customer_reviews.text: The materials, construction, and padding seem good (hence three stars) but the standard sized guitar is a very tight fit. The body space is enough but the end of the guitar pushes the case - which is an inch or two too short. If the case were two inches longer and had more padding in the ends, it would be a five-star case
customer_reviews.author: John D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Easy, Easy
customer_reviews.text: I am a songwriter and I love making songs with my guitar. Never had a case for it so that I can carry it around with me. But when I finally got this case. It is so easy to maneuver around with this case. It's very light, but durable for certain collisions and weather. It fits my notebook for my lyrics, my capo, pens, guitar picks, extra guitar strings, and even a guitar tuner if needed. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TiX

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This case looks like it was worth a lot more than 18-20 bucks (which is how much I paid for it). I haven't carried my 40-41 inch regular sized guitar anywhere yet, but I feel like this case offers moderate protection. I wouldn't trust airport personnel with my guitar stashed in this bag, but the bag itself is great for carrying around if you're planning on handling it around yourself. Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ying

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fire armz
customer_reviews.text: This came in good shape and looks good for the price. Unlike most people this is not for a guitar at all. This will be for transporting my fire arms from home. I live in a safe area but it's still best not to advertise what you have. This is just long enough and I will reinforce the neck area with a large pvc pipe and add foam to the rest so it holds its "guitar" shape. Other covert fire arm cases look obvious to me being a big rectangle and are out of my price range. This is much more affordable and actually looks like something else.
customer_reviews.author: NICKER-PECKER

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Received it ripped, would give 0 to negative stars if possible
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a case that could easily be folded up and stored away in a small space as I live on a boat and don’t have much room. This is perfect! Folds up even smaller than I imagined, yet seems protective enough to keep from scratching up my guitar if it bumps into something when taking it to a gig. Seems very well made for the price. While I wouldn’t recommend checking it at the airport, I would recommend that with any “gig” bag. Fits my full sized Voyge-air dreadnought acoustic guitar. While I haven’t tried it yet, I’m confident it will fit my Martin D35 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Simmons Norwood

customer_reviews.title: It ripped the first time I try to put guitar ...
customer_reviews.text: It ripped the first time I try to put guitar in then the zipper broke I am sending it back for refund
customer_reviews.author: James Iacouzzi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall Great cover for a guitar. Note, it’s a bit big for a 3/4 size guitar but I don’t mind the extra space as long as it’s doing the job to protect it. If that’s a concern keep that in mind before purchasing. As far as durability seems strong but we are not transporting the guitar from one place to another just yet. So it works for us but will update later, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: CristiG

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I got this case back in December 2018 and its been really good to me! I used it to carry to class or out to play under bridges with friends. The straps are durable and over I trust this case to protect my guitar against other objects from scratches and dust. However if youre looking for something more durable, you should go with a hard case obviously. This is nice, thin, and lightweight which is what i wanted since my guitar doesnt leave the house often.
customer_reviews.author: joann

customer_reviews.title: Thin to no padding, not for long term.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin to no padding. The reason for giving three stars is that the zipper was very tight, and seemed like over time it would eventually pull apart at the seems. The guitars I tried were an Epiphone Pro-1 Spanish Classical guitar (with slimmer body), and a full sized dreadnaught. This seems like it would be a good temporary case to keep the dust off, however not for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Warren

customer_reviews.title: Decent Low Cost Option
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine as a low cost gig bag. Not going to give a ton of protection, it's basically just handles for your guitar and some padding equivalent to a blanket. My only complaint is there should probably be some different reinforcement at the headstock area - the wires from the tuning pegs have ripped up the thin cloth fabric liner there.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hite

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bag
customer_reviews.text: If you are wondering, a Yamaha FG700/800 will fit. Padding is ok but I wouldn't throw it around. Neck pocket is thin but the bottom one is spacious. Seems well made, I can't pull the straps or handles off. Zips good, so there's that. Great value for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B. Blowers

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great bag for what I paid for it. Fits my bajo sexto perfectly. Has one big pocket and a smaller pocket by the headstock. Material seems water resistant. I also like that it has two straps on the back. I can wear my instrument like a backpack. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to carry my guitar around whenever I had lessons. I'm a beginner so this bag was perfect. I was able to store sheets in the front and hold my tuner and picks in the small compartment on top. this bag makes it super easy to carry around my guitar. This bag fits my: Yamaha F325 acoustic guitar. Fits perfectly. I didn't have any issues with it being too small or anything.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Huge tear in fabric after three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month of owning, and the side handle area has completely torn and is falling apart. The tear is more than a foot long, and the inner padding area is falling out. The year isnt along a seam, but the fabric itself, so not really repairable. The case is very lightweight, so full stars on that. But that's all it has going for it
customer_reviews.author: Sabey-baby

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I got the product delivered on time and as described. As far as sturdiness and durability, well that is going to be an ongoing study. For now though, it seems to be a very good value and a pretty good item. If I wasn't asked to give it a rating for longevity I'd give it more than four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight guitar bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag had great padding to protect your guitar. It is very lightweight and has a big pocket in front where you can carry your music sheets. There is another small pocket that will hold a capo and picks too. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M.J. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Small Bag. Not for full size acoustics.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit any of my Epiphone or Fender 41' acoustic guitars as advertised it would. It is smaller than advertised. I think most likely mislabeled. Cheap construction and material aside from that. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nvr

customer_reviews.title: Backpack straps ripped. Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I liked this case originally. Really light weight and simple. However all the parts are junk and if you this at all it won't even last a couple months. The material rips easily and the clips are made of cheap bendy metal that will not hold the shoulder straps. This is a great guitar case if you plan to only use it once in blue moon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin - no protection
customer_reviews.text: This is merely a bag to put your guitar in to carry it with a handle... it offers no protection so dont go tossing it around. Putting thi in your trunk with a guitar in it is basically the same as putting the guitar in the trunk with no case. You would get more protection from a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Light Padding, Great Pockets And Zippers!
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, and light padding. Great for keeping dust off around the house. Obviously, a sturdier case for travel would be needed, but I was looking for light weight with great zippers and pockets, and I was not disappointed. It does have a faint "new car smell" to it, but I like that...and the smell does fade.
customer_reviews.author: pd01

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Holds an acoustic guitar and lots of gear Cons: - padding is not thick but its better than nothing - after placing guitar and gear inside I lifted the whole pack by the side handle. It ripped immediately, I took a step and it ripped even more producing a large hole. I would like to return it but I sent it of to my cousin in another country with my old guitar. "You get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: stitching on straps fell apart from two weeks of normal use
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say that you get what you pay for...within two weeks or regular use, the weak stitching connecting the double knapsack straps (which I needed)...separated...horrible quality...spend a few extra dollars and buy a gig bag from a seller who would never let such shoddy merchandise leave their shop....and I have never written a negative review like this before...and at 14 dollars...not even worth it to send it back...to much hassle....I feel robbed...do not make my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: "joearm"

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these guitar bags for my 14 year old twin daughters and they fit their guitars perfectly. Very good quality. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: NicknDani

customer_reviews.title: A great gig bag for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what to expect. I have been pleasantly surprised. I bought it to lug my guitar to and from practice. It has two external pockets that allow me to put extra strings and picks in one, and my books in the other. This is a good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JRR

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case - durable! Purchased for my teen daughter. She likes the straps and the pocket to carry music, tuner, picks, etc. Obviously does not protect like a hard case, but it gets the job done for us without spending a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I sent this one to my grandson hes the Mississippi I'm in Florida. Well I say to you if you wanna hear from your grandchildren this is the way immediately I got a call expressing his love for me and for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t gig out with this.
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of protection. Wouldn’t trust giging with this. Kept it as a back up. Ordered a gator case instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dachin

customer_reviews.title: Great overall but not very padded
customer_reviews.text: Great overall but not very padded. Would only recommend for people who are more gentle in nature. If you're thinking about buying this for someone who tends to sling their backpack across the floor when they come home, this would not offer good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Erica N.

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: the case is well made and if it had a fender or gibson logo would be 10 times the price...thinking about getting one to carry a tent in...poles would fit right in...
customer_reviews.author: adrian crutch

customer_reviews.title: Low price for lightly padded gig bag
customer_reviews.text: Padding was thinner than expected. If the guitar suffered a drop of bump it probably will not fully protect the instrument. The bag is priced very low and if you are ok with the thin padding and just want a light cover it’s a good choice
customer_reviews.author: caser

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Great carrying case BUT it’s falling apart at the straps part after less than three months part time use. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Protects my guitar on the road.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a soft case so my guitar would fit in a shallow closet in my motor home. This worked perfectly. Protects the guitar and am able to hang the guitar neck with a strap around the case. Probably not what most people are looking to do. For the money, the case works great and seems to be well built.
customer_reviews.author: PNWgo!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for CBGs
customer_reviews.text: This case is for a small size guitar. I use these cases for the cigar box guitars I build. For 16 bucks you can't beat the price. It's difficult to find cases for the odd shaped CBGs. These work fine. I'll continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: This case is great for the value. It fit my Dreadnaught 41 inch guitar excellent. If you are planning on throwing your guitar around like a sack of potatoes then this is not for you. Suggest you add about 50 extra dollars and try a hard case. If you are looking to have a case to cover your guitar and protect if from the dust and elements (if you carry it to the car when its rainy outside then this works great for the $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will not work for guitars over 41 inches
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quick service it is a fine guitar bag. The end of the head sticks out because it si a 43 inch guitar. O Well for $15. It works
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for a 3/4 classical guitar
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for the price. My son is using it to travel back and forth to guitar lessons. He has a 3/4 classical style guitar in it and there is plenty of room. He stores his book and sheet music in the front pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Zaborowski

customer_reviews.title: Buy a nicer case used on craigslist for the same price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get what you pay for. This would better be described as a Guitar Bag. But if you dont need padding or a hard case, this is the product for you.

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used guitar to just carry around without having to worry about damaging. This cas works well and has plenty of pockets for storage. It could be a little thicker with the padding, but it protects from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: good soft guitar case.
customer_reviews.text: lightweight (not for checking luggage on a plane). easy to carry. good size compartment. 2 handles and back straps to carry it on your back. ... and a great price. make sure it will fit your guitar. (i have a smaller martin). go for it.
customer_reviews.author: m. forrest

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: It said it fits the guitar I bought, but it’s about a foot too long, but at least I can fit my mini amplifier and a few books in it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica travis

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift and loved it once it came in
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and loved it once it came in. It looks way better in person and fit the guitar perfectly! I would definitely recommend this if you need a guitar bag because it may be cheap in price, but it's not cheap in quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kayla M. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's great that it's a standard size, my guitars fit perfectly. It's sturdy, cushiony enough to keep guitars protected.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Genao

customer_reviews.title: Came as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She was happy to get it and I haven't heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Swofford

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner gig bag
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this is not a guitar case, it is a guitar gig bag. It does not provide much protection for the guitar but allows you an easy way to carry it. My grandson likes it, though, and that’s probably the most important thing to me!
customer_reviews.author: JDRWaco

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap guitar bag for my son to take his cheap acoustic to college. This works fine and even has some limited padding. Not good enough for taking to a gig or a show(but that wasn't expected with this).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my epiphone. I wasn't even able to get my guitar halfway in the bag. I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, would recommend to others looking to buy
customer_reviews.text: It fits both of my guitars just fine, one is a bit big and it’s a tight fit but not too bad a problem. I like the extra pouch for music sheets, pencils, and whatever else (I’ve put my tablet in it and it’s been big enough for it as well). All in all a really good guitar case, saved my guitar from the harsh weather and cold nights.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Chan

customer_reviews.title: not nearly as nice as the fender case i have but hey it ...
customer_reviews.text: darn decent, not nearly as nice as the fender case i have but hey it was cheap. good enough for the price - on my cheeeeap guitar
customer_reviews.author: zomgwtfbbq

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to carry my guitar while riding the motorcycle. No other practical way of transporting a guitar while on two wheels other than this. Comfortable straps and just the right fitment for my 5'10" frame to experience the wind in my face on my way to a music lesson or a friend's place to practice. I would be faced with driving the car if I had found this great little guitar case.
customer_reviews.author: Boxador family

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for an AR
customer_reviews.text: Works great and discretely holds my 18” barrel AR-15 without breaking it down very well for going to the range. Not super padded, but works well for moving from point A to point B.
customer_reviews.author: Preppa the Pig

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price..
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a cheap guitar bag! Zippers were questionable when I first opened because it seemed like it could come apart after being zipped but once I zipped/unzipped it seemed to get on track and is working fine. Quality of bag seems like it will hold up
customer_reviews.author: skaminskas

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, but I knew that by the price. You get what you pay for. It still works though
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Win win!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. My son was given a guitar for his school class and needed something light to carry to and from school. Works perfect and right in budget!
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great case for good $
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my new guitar: Oscar Schmidt OG2SM (awesome guitar by the way!) Anyway, wanted something light and durable for taking the guitar around and it's just exactly what I needed. It's super light but good enough to keep my instrument from accidental scratches. The zipper is a bit cheap and sometimes catches fabric but it's the only concern. Go ahead and buy it, it's definitely worth the $15!
customer_reviews.author: Yarik

customer_reviews.title: It works! Read the review! It does EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do: Hangs up from stuff. Works as a back pack. Holds my guitar. Holds stuff. Protects my guitar. And more!?? A+ Durable too. Go get one.
customer_reviews.author: amazoninja85

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter, she was pleased with it. Easy to use, seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: RosieC

customer_reviews.title: Fits acoustic guitar perfectly in sturdy canvas case
customer_reviews.text: Thick canvas case for an acoustic guitar. Great price for the value of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: My standard acoustic guitar just fits perfectly. I almost thought it wouldn't but it fits with no room to spare. But I guess that's how it needs to be to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Lroses77

customer_reviews.title: There are better bags
customer_reviews.text: It works - a snug fit on my Seagull acoustic. Not much padding and you have the big logo on the front. The Amazon Basics acoustic bag for just a little more is much better quality. I bought both. Sorry Faswin.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Guitar

customer_reviews.title: Especially if you’re a beginner bc the price is great!! People told me these cases are usually ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate! This case is so worth it. Instead of carrying your guitar by itself, get this case!!!!! Especially if you’re a beginner bc the price is great!! People told me these cases are usually $60 at guitar stores!!! The material is also very very thick! Will support your guitar when carrying it as a back pack.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Great Soft Guitar Case for Resonable Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic case for the price! I was very impressed! Fit a 41” acoustic guitar perfectly. It has two nice zipper pockets to keep books, picks etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! I can't believe how awesome this case is. It's thick, made well, has extra zipper pockets plus a handle on top, on the side and back back straps. You can't get a better case for this price.
customer_reviews.author: MyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, save your money find something else.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, cheaply made, and the worst part is that it smells of wet clothes and mold.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirez Family

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Item is great for the money! Much better than expected! Fit perfectly and it made from a durable material! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag!
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a pretty good bag. It's a great quality. I found myself needing one because I recently started going to guitar classes and I didn't had a bag for my guitar. So I had to hold the guitar plus the book that we are using and it's pretty hard. So I decided to buy a bag and this one is great for me. Good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandraliz Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: A tremendous value and price....sturdy and a perfect fit for my Washburn Maverick.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Horn

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily
customer_reviews.text: If you're on a VERY tight budget get it, if you can spend a bit more get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: This fits great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and fits just as described. Plenty of pockets, straps and handles! This will be a great case and way for my son to carry his guitar and keep it safe. Well packaged and shipped very fast. Pros: +Great Fit +Lightweight +Easy to Carry Cons: N/A My son uses it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Would buy for other and recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great item, makes it so much easier to transport your guitar in town. Don’t use for air travel.... invest in a hard case. Fits my electric acoustic cutout steel string with a little room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sturdy and solid case for the price! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jada Biafore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gig bag...highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Our son keeps his Oscar Schmidt OG2SM acoustic guitar in this bag when he is hauling it around locally. Fit nicely and has plenty of compartments for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Great case! It has a lot of pockets and it's so easy to carry my guitar in it!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this bag almost daily since christmas and no complaints. looks like it's holding up well. i'd say it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: the delta druid

customer_reviews.title: absolutely great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and protects your guitar. It's not a hard case but it will protect your guitar from dust and scratches for sure. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: asdf

customer_reviews.title: So Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I ordered this for my guitar. Made it a lot easier to carry. The pockets are a bonus because I fill them in with my capo, picks, music sheets & more. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: ~ Christina ~

customer_reviews.title: Light But Good
customer_reviews.text: Light Weight- but protects the guitar well, easy to carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: The Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Not for acoustic guitars
customer_reviews.text: This case is intended for electric guitars and less than full sized acoustic guitars. My normal full sized acoustic guitar only fits inside when stretched to the max.
customer_reviews.author: Bob is what

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Most bags for this price are just canvas covers. This one has a bit of padding and it very decent.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Staniforth

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted a simple inexpensive case and this far ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a simple inexpensive case and this far exceeded my expectations. It fits my old guitar with room to spare, has a pocket to hold my "stuff" and is very functional. Thanks so much. You can't beat this price for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Zdrodowski

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: pretty good so far. i bought 8 of these. so far so good. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ToneOneOnly

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your money on this bag. Within one day of use the buckle holding one of the backpack straps on had already come off. Now I have to carry this by the side strap instead of on my back. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Decent gig bag...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space for books, picks, capos, etc. a full size dreadnaught guitar fits perfectly. Nicely padded. Good bag for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: I always wanted to get a guitar bag and they are like at least $50 at the music store
customer_reviews.text: I placed the order yesterday and received it today, very fast delivery! I always wanted to get a guitar bag and they are like at least $50 at the music store, so I didnt expect to find guitar bags that are under $20 but in good quality. The bag fits my acoustic guitar perfectly. The only thing i dont like about it is the smell, but the bag itself is good and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lin,Yingwen

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Just what I needed to store and carry my guitar!
customer_reviews.author: A. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Guitar Soft Case
customer_reviews.text: Actually, it is cheap but also very good quality for a low cost soft case. Will probably order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Has taken my guitar places
customer_reviews.text: my music may suck but at least I'm trying, MOM
customer_reviews.author: Camisha McClair

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a little heavy than I thought it would be, otherwise, it's a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great case for Guitar.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Guitar case for my son's acoustic guitar and it fits perfect for standard guitar without a doubt, very light and strong fabric to protect the guitar. I really recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good to prevent your guitar from collecting dust
customer_reviews.text: It has almost no pads at all. Only good to prevent your guitar from collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: BENJAMIN GUZMAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i ordered, shipped on time, and plenty of other perfect things. Definitely worth the purchase if youre looking for a guitar case.
customer_reviews.author: RachDunn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Fits my standard guitar like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fits my standard guitar like a glove. Kinda wish the pocket on the front was a little bigger to hold my guitar lesson book though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrabart

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits our acoustic guitar just right. Nice big front pocket, comfortable straps, easy to open and close. Fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

product_meta.title: Faswin 41 Inch Guitar Bag Dual Adjustable Shoulder Strap Acoustic Guitar Gig Bag - Black
feature_bullets: Features high-quality material and compact size can offer your guitar utmost protection.
Each acoustic guitar bag features the non-abrasive soft lining, puncture resistant headstock and bridge patches, zippered exterior sheet music pocket, and backpack straps.
The stylish appearance and solid construction will keep your guitar against scratches and dirt
